name: Melaka
startIntroPart1: Peace be upon you and upon you be peace
declaringWar: I, the Sultan of Melaka, hereby declare war upon the enemies who threaten our kingdom.
attacked: We, the people and soldiers of Melaka, will defend our homeland against the enemy's attack. United we stand, divided we fall!
defeated: We will rise again. Let us unite, pray, and strive to rebuild our strength and sovereignty. Our struggle is not over.
introduction: Welcome to Melaka: The Jewel of the Malay Archipelago
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
